meanings.definition: Lacking in interest, excitement, or meaning
meanings.sent1: The aridest lecture I ever attended put me to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The book was so aridest that I couldn't finish it.
meanings.sent3: The party was so aridest that even the balloons seemed bored.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the aridest desert, devoid of any emotion.
meanings.sent5: The aridest landscape of the movie made it hard to stay awake.

meanings.sent1: The aridest desert on Earth is the Sahara.
meanings.sent2: After the drought, the land became aridest and cracked.
meanings.sent3: The aridest toast in the world could not be buttered.
meanings.sent4: His humor was as aridest as a desert without a drop of water.
meanings.sent5: The aridest climate made it impossible for plants to grow.
